NAME: Harsh Agarwal
ABOUT:
Harsh completed his B.Com (Honours) in Finance from St. Xavier's College, Kolkata. He started his career as a Portfolio Manager with PKC Commodities where he worked for 11 months serving as a Technical Research Expert. Thereafter he decided to pursue his Masters in Finance to enhance his existing cognizance.

He completed his Masters in Business Administration (MBA) from Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies, Mumbai specialising in Finance. He has worked with Duff & Phelps as a Business Valuation Intern as a part of his Summer Internship Programme. He had also worked with Equity Levers where he has served as a Financial Analyst & Equity Research Advisory. To hone his Market Research Skills, he joined the Qual team of Kantar IMRB where he worked on client projects with some of his clients being Tata Trust, Godrej, Star Media.

Harsh is a finance enthusiast and has participated in several national level competitions in finance, marketing, consulting domains and has emerged victorious on several occasions. He was also adjudged the National Runner Up at LinkedIn MTV Get a Job Season 4.

Harsh has won 29 competitions of National repute across 19 premier business schools of the country covering almost all of the Top 20 business schools in India. In total he has won 45 National level competitions including 5 corporate competitions. For his overall excellence across academics and extracurricular activities, he was awarded with the Dun & Bradstreet Award for being the Best Student of the Year at his business school.

Currently, he is working with Goldman Sachs as an Investment Banking Analyst in Bengaluru, India. He has traveled to US and UK on short term assignments.
